name: Datascribe LPO
tagline: A Leading Legal Services Solutions Provider.
description:
Datascribe is one of the leading legal services solutions provider, delivering legal, shared and advisory services from secure centres in Bangalore, India to top law firms and corporations in the US and Canada. Since 2005, we’ve been successfully providing onsite/onshore and offshore services for our clients across USA, Canada, and India. We’re committed to render quality services to our clients.
In fact, our processes are driven by quantitative and process driven approach, ensuring quality work without losing focus on quantity and time.
